package.description: The WideSelect control is a list control which supports buffered and paginated presentation.

static-class.name: WideSelect
static-class.description: Control for buffering and paging large sets of data for display.

method.name: newInstance
method.param: Parent HTML Node in which the control will be created.

class.name: WideSelectItem
class.description: Object representing an item in the WideSelect control.

property.name: data
property.description: The data referenced or held by the item.

property.name: object
property.description: The HTML object used to display the item.

property.name: index
property.description: Index of this item in the items array.

class.name: ImportPageItem
class.description: Object construct used to bulk load paginated items.

property.name: index
property.description: Index of this item in the items array.

package.class:
WideSelectInstance 3.5.1 A buffering and pagination control for displaying large and incremental sets of data.
object_id Unique instance identifier.
object_version Version of the object class.
object_type The type of this object.
ready_state Object load and execution state. Follows: 0 unitialized, 1 through 3 variant, 4 ready, 5 destroyed.
object_config Object API structure for storing sub structures: object_config.pointers and object_config.status.
getObjectId The unique object instance id. Returns the unique id of the object.
getObjectType The type of the object instance. Returns the type of the object.
getObjectVersion The version of the object instance. Returns the version of the object.
getReadyState The object ready state. Returns the state of the object.
onbuffercommitted The WideSelect control for which the buffer was committed. Message published to all subscribers when a buffered resultset was committed; being completely rendered and/or paginated.
onresultclick The WideSelect control for which the item state was changed. Message published to all subscribers when the state changes for a WideSelectItem object.
handle_pagenavigate Static parameter: onpagenavigate. Current page index. Handler is specified in the WideSelectInstance constructor; newInstance.
getPointers The object_config.pointers substructure. Returns the object_config.pointers sub structure.
setMultiple Bit indicating whether multiple selection is enabled. Sets whether multiple selection is enabled.
getMultiple Bit indicating whether multiple selection is enabled. Returns whether multiple selection is enabled.
setMaximumItems Maximum number of items supported by the control. Sets the maximum number of items supported by the control. Specify zero to indicate no limit. Any items over the maximum when rollover is enabled will cause the top-most item to be removed. When rollover is disabled, the addItem method will fail on the last item.
getMaximumItems Maximum number of items supported by the control. Zero indicates no limit. Returns the maximum number of items supported by the control.
setMaximumPageItems Maximum number of items to be displayed per page. Sets the maximum number of items displayed per page, if paging is enabled.
getMaximumPageItems Maximum number of items displayed per page. Returns the maximum number of items to display per page, if paging is enabled.
getCurrentPageItemCount Number of items in the current page. Returns the number of items in the current page.
getContainer HTML Node in which the control is created. Returns the the HTML Node in which the control is created.
getBufferMark Current insert position in the buffer. Returns the current position in the buffer, after which additional items will be rendered.
setResultHandler Function pointer to click handler. Specifies the handler to invoke when a result item is activated.
getBufferSize Current size of the buffer. Returns the current size of the buffer.
getItemSize Count of all rendered and paginated items. Returns the current size of all items in the control.
getItems Array of WideSelectItem objects. Returns an array of WideSelectItem objects.
getItem Index of WideSelectItem in items array. WideSelectItem object. Returns the WideSelectItem object at the specified index.
getActiveItem WideSelectItem object. Returns the selected WideSelectItem object.
setCanRequest Bit indicating whether the control can be requested. Specifies whether the WideSelect control can be requested. The request featureset is used when the control is a pop-up or conditionally visible.
setIsPaging Bit indicating whether the control is in paging mode. Specifies whether the WideSelect control is in paging mode. Changing this value will clear paged items, and the control will need to be repopulated.
getIsPaging Bit indicating whether the control is in paging mode. Returns whether the WideSelect control is in paging mode.
setPageStop Bit indicating whether the control should stop expecting more data. Specifies whether the WideSelect control should stop expecting more data, when in paging mode.
getPageStop Bit indicating whether the control is no longer expecting additional data. Returns whether the WideSelect control is no longer expecting data.
setAutoCommit Bit indicating whether the control will automatically render items as they are added. Specifies whether the WideSelect control should render items as they are added. If buffering is enabled, items will automatically begin rendering.
setAutoScroll Bit indicating whether the control will automatically scroll to the last rendered item. Specifies whether the WideSelect control will automatically scroll to the last rendered item.
setAutoSelect Bit indicating whether the control will automatically select the last rendered item. Specifies whether the WideSelect control will automatically select the last rendered item.
setMaximumRollover Bit indicating whether the control will rollover when the maximum number of items is reached. Specifies whether the WideSelect control will rollover when the maximum number of items is reached; deleting the first item and adding the new item to the end. If disabled and a maximum limit is stipulated, then new items won't be added.
deselectAllItems Deselects all selected items in the WideSelect control.
init Initializes the WideSelect control.
Specify avoid so the Space service doesn't drill into the results
_handle_window_destroy Message subscription handler invoked when the host window is unloading.
setIsBuffered Bit indicating whether the control should buffer new items. Specifies whether the control should buffer new items. Buffered items are incrementally rendered.
setBufferOffset Number of items to render at a time. Specifies the number of items to be rendered at a time.
setBufferDelay Number of milleseconds. Specifies the number of milliseconds to pause between rendering the buffer offset.
destroy Cleans up internal pointers, empties buffers, and removes HTML artifacts. Invoked when the window is unloaded.
addItem Name of the item. The name is used for the label. The value of the item. Adds an item to the WideSelect control. The item is displayed based on buffering, and maximum display settings and restrictions. Use pageItem to add items for pagination. Specify a value of "_avoid" to create non-selectable labels.
_handle_buffer_check Internal operation for testing the state of the buffer.
commitBuffer Commits the buffer up to the next buffer offset. Invoked automatically when AutoCommit is enabled.
_handle_commit_buffer Internal operation for committing the buffer into the WideSelectItem array.
pageItem Name of the item. The name is used for the label. The value of the item. Adds an item for pagination within the WideSelect control. The item is displayed based on pagination settings.
updatePage Renders the current page of WideSelectItem objects.
_addItem Name of the item. The name is used for the label. The value of the item. Creates and renders a WideSelectItem object.
_handle_mouseover Event object Internal handler for mouseover event.
_handle_mouseout Event object Internal handler for mouseout event.
setActiveItem Index of WideSelectItem to activate. Selects the specified WideSelectItem . Blocks publication of the onresultclick message.
selectItem Index of WideSelectItem to activate. Bit indicating whether to block the onresultclick message. Selects the specified WideSelectItem.
scrollToItem Index of WideSelectItem to activate. Scrolls to control to the specified WideSelectItem.
_handle_click Overloaded variant which may be an event or index. Bit indicating whether the "onresultclick" message should be suppressed. Internal handler for mouseout event.
clearItem Index of WideSelectItem to remove. Removes the specified WideSelectItem.
clearItems Removes all WideSelectItem objects.
clearPagingValues Removes all paged WideSelectItem objects.
reset Clears both paged and non-paged WideSelectItem objects, and ends any active request.
moveFirst Moves the paginated result set to the first page. Invokes any specified handle_pagenavigate handler.
moveLast Moves the paginated result set to the last page. Invokes any specified handle_pagenavigate handler.
getCanMoveNext Bit indicating whether there is an additional page. Checks whether there is an additional page beyond the current.
getCanMovePrevious Bit indicating whether there is a previous page. Checks whether there is a previous page prior to the current.
moveNext Bit indicating whether the operation is a test. Moves the paginated result set to the next page. Invokes any specified handle_pagenavigate handler.
movePrevious Bit indicating whether the operation is a test. Moves the paginated result set to the previous page. Invokes any specified handle_pagenavigate handler.
importPageItems Array of ImportPageItem objects. Bit indicating whether this is the last page. Imports a variant-length array of data into the paginated set of WideSelectItem objects.
request If requesting is enabled, displays and positions the WideSelectInstance control.
endRequest Hides the WideSelectInstance control if requested.
alignControl HTML Node to which the control should be aligned. Aligns the WideSelectInstance to the bottom border of the specified HTML Node.
